casebody.data:
NATIONWIDE AFFINITY INSURANCE COMPANY OF AMERICA
v.
BEI, et al. 185P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 George L. Simpson, IV, Attorney at Law, for Nationwide Affinity Insurance Company of America. Paul A. Tharp, Attorney at Law, for Paw, Tei (Estate of), et al. Glenn C. Raynor, Attorney at Law, for NC Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company, et al.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 12th of September 2018 by NC Farm Bureau Mutual Insurance Company and NC Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
